statements: UPDATE website_traffic SET user_id = 101, page_id = 201, timestamp = '2022-05-15 08:30:00', activity_type = 'Click' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE website_traffic SET timestamp = '2022-05-16 10:45:00', activity_type = 'Visit', user_id = 102 WHERE page_id = 202;
UPDATE website_traffic SET user_id = 100, activity_type = 'Page Visit' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE website_traffic SET timestamp = '2022-01-01 10:00:00', page_id = 5 WHERE user_id = 200;
UPDATE website_traffic SET engagement_score = 8.5 WHERE user_id = 123 AND page_id = 456;
UPDATE ad_placements SET advertiser_id = 789, ad_id = 987 WHERE page_id = 456;
UPDATE website_traffic SET engagement_score = 8.5 WHERE user_id = 123 AND page_id = 456;
UPDATE ad_placements SET advertiser_id = 789, ad_id = 321 WHERE page_id = 456;
UPDATE website_traffic SET page_url = 'www.example.com/about' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE user_engagement SET engagement_score = 8.5, total_visits = 20 WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE website_traffic SET visit_date = '2022-10-15', visit_time = '08:30:00' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE user_engagement SET total_visits = 20, engagement_score = 8.9, last_login = '2022-10-14 17:45:00' WHERE user_id = 1000;
UPDATE website_visits SET duration_in_seconds = 60 WHERE visit_id = 1001;
UPDATE ad_placements SET cost_per_impression = 5.99, impressions_count = 500 WHERE ad_id = 2001;
UPDATE website_visits SET page_visited = 'Home Page' WHERE user_id = 123 AND visit_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
UPDATE ad_placements SET impressions_count = impressions_count + 100, cost_per_impression = 0.75 WHERE ad_id = 456
UPDATE website_visits SET page_visited = 'Home Page' WHERE visitor_id = 12345;
UPDATE ad_revenue SET revenue_amount = 5000.00, revenue_date = '2022-06-15' WHERE ad_id = 100;
UPDATE website_visits SET page_visited = 'Homepage' WHERE visit_id = 1;
UPDATE ad_performance SET impressions = 150, clicks = 20 WHERE ad_id = 5;
